1410050.name: Angry Rock
1410050.description:
Ever felt like tossing a rock at high speeds? Then you're in luck with Angry Rock! Throw rocks by dragging your mouse away from the direction you intend to throw and they'll fly in the opposite direction compared to where you dragged. Achieve high scores as you beat the various levels included in Angry Rock. It's sure to be a rockin' good time!

Features:
  • Physics-Based Gameplay Inspired By Angry Birds
  • Throw/Toss Rocks
  • Anger Management
  • Stress Alleviation
1410050.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
